personaggi.heading: Who Weâ€™re Talking About
personaggi.text: Every song tells a story, and every story has its heroes! Check out the characters who bring our musical adventures to life.
personaggi.carousel.ciccio.caption: Ciccio Pasticcio
personaggi.carousel.ciccio.small: A mischievous character with a bold streak: whenever he falls, thereâ€™s always a friend ready to help!
personaggi.carousel.barby.caption: Barby Mita
personaggi.carousel.barby.small: Dreaming of greatness yet getting lost in the details. One day heâ€™ll conquer the world, the next heâ€™s still looking for the perfect shoes!
personaggi.carousel.regina.caption: King and Queen of the Park
personaggi.carousel.regina.small: They zoom around on their scooters, but never without a helmet! Fast, stylish, and always ready for new adventures.
team.heading: Who Sings and Who Plays?
team.text: Two dads determined to get everyoneâ€”young and oldâ€”dancingâ€¦ and theyâ€™re not alone! Special guests and secret characters hide among the tracks.
team.member.nebil.name: Nebil
team.member.nebil.caption: A software developer by day and musician by night. After studying at Blank Music School, he merged code with melody, launching successful startups and new musical adventures.
team.member.filippo.name: Filippo
team.member.filippo.caption: A producer with 20 years of experience. Heâ€™s behind projects like Mister Fil and Venetian Custom Garage, while organizing events that shake the floors (and the neighbors).
